content: ⚽️Dear friends!⚽️FIFA Fan Battle Club holds a "Guess the score" campaign until the end of the World Cup. Every day we post the announcement of one game, which will take place according to the schedule on this day at the World Cup.The fan who guesses the outcome of the match first will receive $60 from FIFA Fan Battle Club.Test your intuition and earn on it!Telegram: @FIFAFanBattle_Club
